title: 2 S Ranks, No Chests
body: My friend and I just got an S rank for both of us (I got one with {{champion:150}}Gnar and he got one with {{champion:238}}Zed), I got a Gnar Mastery 6 shard, but I didn't get two chests, but my friend got two chests. Could you guys please fix this?

replies.body:
you need to own the champ, if you do own her, idk
also you need to be in the premade with the player that got the S.

Do you mean in the same game? You wouldn't be able to get two chests from a single game.

I think I found the game that you're referencing (the one you got a level 6 token in) and it looks like the reason you didn't get a chest from that game is that you already earned a chest on Gnar previously. As someone else has commented, you are only able to earn a chest on a champion once per season. Hope this helps to clarify things a bit :D
I actually remembered that I did earn an S on Gnar already, was gonna delete this post but I guess I'll just keep it up now. Ty.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pEXTrlzq,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-23T21:38:42.927+0000)
>
> Do you mean in the same game? You wouldn't be able to get two chests from a single game.
> 
> I think I found the game that you're referencing (the one you got a level 6 token in) and it looks like the reason you didn't get a chest from that game is that you already earned a chest on Gnar previously. As someone else has commented, you are only able to earn a chest on a champion once per season. Hope this helps to clarify things a bit :D

You can see grade and rewards in our match history? Do you know/can you say whether there is any plans to add this to the client in the future? Would be very nice to see what grade I got in previous games. What about seeing other players grades? Thanks.

To receive a chest, you must meet a few other requirements;

1. You must have at least 1 of your 4 chest slots available. You can see how many are available in your Champion page.
2. You must have not received a chest on the champion you're playing yet this season. In your Champion page, champs you've already earned one on will have a gold border.
3. You must not be ineligible for loot due to current or recent behavioral restrictions. [Read more on that here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/57wOcrmh-if-you-are-ineligible-for-hextech-loot-read-here-for-info-on-becoming-eligible-again).

Your friend didn't get 2 chests. It's impossible because you can only get one per season on a champion, whether a premade ally earns it through an S or you did.
